features: 10 flip-top packs of 56 Huggies Natural Care Refreshing Baby Wipes, Scented (560 wipes total), the same baby wipes you love, now with brand new Tigger from Winnie-The-Pooh designs
EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing: one-handed dispensing makes it easy to grab wipes without wasting sheets; packaging may vary from images shown
Plant-Based Wipes Since 1990: Natural Care Refreshing Wipes are plant-based and contain 99% purified water for a gentle clean
Refreshing Clean: Lightly scented diaper wipes infused with cucumber and green tea for a refreshing clean

No Harsh Ingredients: Natural Care Refreshing Wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist tested and pH balanced to help maintain healthy skin; free of lotions, parabens, alcohol, dyes and elemental chlorine; does not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT
body.description: Give your baby a light, refreshing and gentle clean with Huggies Natural Care Refreshing Baby Wipes. Using plant-based ingredients for over 20 years* (*70%+ by weight plant-based materials), these scented baby wipes are made with 99% purified water and infused with cucumber and green tea. They're free of lotions, alcohol, dyes and parabens with no harsh ingredients. They're also hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced to help maintain healthy skin for your baby. With these plush baby wipes, you can confidently give your baby a soft, fresh clean every time. Huggies Natural Care Refreshing Wipes come in enchanting packaging featuring Tigger and are available in a variety of pack options, perfect for use at home or on-the-go: flip-top packs, refill packs and the stylish Clutch 'N' Clean refillable travel pouch. Don't get caught without Huggies wipes! Sign up for Subscribe & Save to ensure you always have Huggies Natural Care Refreshing Wipes on hand. (*70%+ by weight)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Designed to gently clean, soothe and protect Skin can be delicate, baby. Natural Care Refreshing Wipes are gentle and moisturizing on your skin. Our most refreshing wipe for when you need it most Smell the light scent of cucumber & green tea, baby? Relax and enjoy the invigorating, gentle clean. Keep perfect skin healthy with 99% purified water With aloe & vitamin E, our pH balanced sensitive baby wipes gently cleanse and moisturize your skin. Keeping your delicate skin healthy and clean Hypoallergenic is a big word that means Natural Care Refreshing Wipes are safe for sensitive skin. Making changing time less fussy Changes are easier when mom or dad can grab one wipe at a time with EZPull 1-Handed Dispensing. Next page 1 Gentle Clean 2 Refreshing Scent 3 99% Purified Water 4 Hypoallergenic 5 1-Handed Dispensing

We got you, baby. Wipes & Diapers. Mom & Snuggles. Mac & cheese. These classic duos are always better together, baby! Pair up your wipes with Huggies Little Snugglers, our perfect diaper for gentle skin protection. Shop We got you, baby. Wipes are only half of the equation, baby. Huggies Little Movers Diapers + Natural Care Sensitive Wipes = your perfect diapering duo! Wow, baby, you've practically mastered math. Shop

Huggies is proud to sponsor Hand to Hold Some of our happiest moments happen during hard times. That’s why Huggies helps with free virtual services to families before, during, & after being in the NICU.

What makes Huggies Natural Care Refreshing Baby Wipes right for you, baby? Natural Care Refreshing Baby Wipes give you a relaxing clean and a refreshing scent without harsh ingredients. Made with 99% purified water and enriched with cucumber and green tea, our baby wipes will help keep your skin clean and healthy. You’re learning all about new smells, baby, and you may want to know—are these wipes scented? Huggies Natural Care Refreshing Baby Wipes are lightly scented with cucumber and green tea. They're lotion-free, hypoallergenic and free from parabens and dyes. If you want unscented wipes, try our Natural Care Sensitive Wipes. Are Huggies Baby Wipes plant-based? For your delicate skin, baby, we like to keep things simple. All of Huggies baby wipes are made with at least 70% plant-based fibers by weight to ensure a gentle clean that’s free of harsh chemicals. Are these baby wipes easy to grab one-handed? Mom’s got her hands full, baby. But don’t worry, our wipes have EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing so it’s easy to grab just one wipe at a time without wasting sheets. Using the toilet is an important lesson to learn, baby, but you might wonder if Huggies Baby Wipes are flushable? Designed for cushiony softness and durability, Huggies baby wipes don't easily break down after flushing. Please don’t flush baby wipes, and instead use the trash bin for your wipes and diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good ole Huggies.
reviews.reviewText: I've tried many other wipes in my search to find something less expensive. But I have to keep going back to Huggies because of the quality. The material of the wipes for Huggies grips well and doesn't slide on itself when you're trying to wipe. They are soft and they are a nice size. I usually get the scented kind and the scent is very pleasant and mild. I've never noticed any irritation from any of the sense. Huggies is just a great quality product. Huggies please don't ever change the quality of the material. Every other brand that I've used slides on itself when folded which makes it really hard not to make a mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells amazing and fresh
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are stronger than most and smell amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best bang for the buck! Amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m in love with the scent!! 🥰♥️
reviews.reviewText: It has a perfect fresh cucumber scent I’m in love.The texture is so soft.I love the packaging of the wipes bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huggies wipes are the best!
reviews.reviewText: Huggies wipes have truly set the standard for excellence. The thickness of the wipes is remarkable, providing a substantial and durable feel that instills confidence during cleanups. The perfect balance of moisture ensures effective cleaning without being overly wet, leaving my baby's skin feeling refreshed. These wipes glide smoothly, making diaper changes a breeze. Huggies wipes have become essential in my parenting toolkit, offering both quality and convenience in every use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only brand I trust!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried alot brands and my skin is sensitive and Huggies leaves a clean feeling, n scent when you use it. Most brands leave a gritty feeling but huggies is very clean and smells really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like them
reviews.reviewText: Pros- These are thick enough to not get baby poop on the hands (please still wash your hands though), they have a nice scent, and they are a pretty good value.Cons- They are a little scratchy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: There are a LOT of wipes in this box. And they last a while. They are soft for my toddler. And takes less than other brands to wipe him. No reactions either. All in all a great product.
